Translations.Text: kintu tara naya, yara bisbasa sthapana kare o satkarma kare ebam parasparake takida kare satyera ebam takida kare sabarera.
Pratyeka pascate o sam'mukhe paranindakarira durbhoga
Ye artha sancita kare o ganana kare
se mane kare ye, tara artha cirakala tara sathe thakabe
kakhana'o na, se abasya'i niksipta habe pistakarira madhye.
Apani ki dekhenani apanara palanakarta hastibahinira sathe kirupa byabahara karechena
tini ki tadera cakranta nasyat kare denani
tini tadera upara prerana karechena jhamke jhamke pakhi
yara tadera upara patharera kankara niksepa karachila.
Atahpara tini taderake bhaksita trnasadrsa kare dena.
